Class CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Impl.CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    CommandClient

    public static class CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for building a CommandClient instance with chaining.

    Cardinal System

      • withThreadTimeout

        public CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder withThreadTimeout(long timeout)
        Sets the timeout for threads waiting for events to be processed. If this is not invoked, the timeout will be set to default 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout, in miliseconds.
        Returns:
        the CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder, for chaining.
